snippet: Four of the five major contenders this year are 3-year-olds — England’s Taghrooda, Japan’s Harp Star, and France’s Avenir Certain and Ectot — and of those four all but Ectot are fillies.
lead_paragraph: Four of the five major contenders this year are 3-year-olds — England’s Taghrooda, Japan’s Harp Star, and France’s Avenir Certain and Ectot — and of those four all but Ectot are fillies.

headline.seo: The Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe Has Favored 3-Year-Olds Lately
headline.content_kicker: Special Report: Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe
